title: Which are the top 5 unicorn startups in the world in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Top 5 startup in world are Ant Financial - china based company has valued over 150 billion dollarByte Dance- this is china based tech company owns tiktok , hello and many other social media apps and valued around 78 billion dollarsDiDi - china based cab sharing startup is valued over 51 billion dollarsAirbnb - airbnb is valued around 38 billion dollar on March 2018Stripe - usa based startup is now valued over 35 billion dollar on September 2019

We at Tracxn track startups and private companies across the world. To answer your question, we have curated a list of Top 5 Unicorn Companies In The World As of 2020 (Founded Since 2010). Didi (2012, Beijing, $18968M): Chinese ride-hailing conglomerateGrab (2012, Singapore, $9956M): Tech-based solution for ride-hailing and on-demand servicesGojek (2010, Jakarta, $5000M): Bike taxi aggregator and provider of multi-vertical on-demand servicesKuaishou (2011, Haidian, $4788M): Video sharing mobile app with a focus on content popular among China's farmers and migrant workersCoupang (2010, Seoul, $4000M): Online marketplace of multi-category productsHope this answers your question. * Figures inside bracket represents Founding Year, HQ City, Total Funding raised by the company till date. Visit our Reports page for more interesting insights.
